item.name: Phrase Controller
item.description: Provides operations to work on Phrase objects

item.name: Get all phrases for currently authenticated user

request.name: Get all phrases for currently authenticated user

item.name: Creates or merges if possible a phrase translations. Phrase is created for user or global context

request.name: Creates or merges if possible a phrase translations. Phrase is created for user or global context

response.name: If content is wrong or if there are translations that cannot be merge into another phrase

item.name: Translation Game Controller
item.description: Provides operations to entirely handle a translation game

item.name: Stops currently active translation game session and thus allowing to start a new one

request.name: Stops currently active translation game session and thus allowing to start a new one

item.name: Starts a translation game for a user

request.name: Starts a translation game for a user

response.name: If user is already in different translation game or if provided parameters are wrong

item.name: Draws a random phrase for user's currently active game

request.name: Draws a random phrase for user's currently active game

response.name: If user is not in quiz game or user does have already active question

item.name: Translates a phrase associated with active translation game session

request.name: Translates a phrase associated with active translation game session

response.name: If user is not in quiz game or user does not have active question

item.name: Authentication Controller
item.description: Provides operations to work with user authentication

item.name: Register given user

response.name: If provided credentials are taken by another user or if credentials are semantically wrong

item.name: Extends the lifespan of the access token based on given refresh token in cookie

request.name: Extends the lifespan of the access token based on given refresh token in cookie

response.name: If provided credentials are semantically wrong or no refresh_token cookie provided

item.name: Authenticates given user

response.name: If provided credentials are semantically wrong

item.name: Retrieves basic information about user
Returns XSRF-TOKEN in cookie to be used in further requests. To pass the CSRF protection the cookie and 'X-XSRF-TOKEN' header.

request.name: Returns XSRF-TOKEN in cookie to be used in further requests. To pass the CSRF protection the cookie and 'X-XSRF-TOKEN' header.

item.name: Quiz Game Controller
item.description: Provides operations to entirely handle a quiz game. Operations are executed for a user associated with given authentication

item.name: Stops currently active quiz game session and thus allowing to start a new one

request.name: Stops currently active quiz game session and thus allowing to start a new one

item.name: Starts a quiz game for a user

request.name: Starts a quiz game for a user

response.name: If user is already in different quiz game or if provided questions parameter is wrong

item.name: Draws a random question for user's currently active game

request.name: Draws a random question for user's currently active game

response.name: If user is not in quiz game or user does have already active question

item.name: Answers a question associated with active quiz game session

request.name: Answers a question associated with active quiz game session

response.name: If user is not in quiz game or user does not have active question

item.name: Question Operations
item.description: Provides operations to work on Question objects

item.name: Creates new question

response.name: If some of provided request fields are wrong
